Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' compared to 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' followed by 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' that lead to 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all rejections
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' in relation to total declarations processed
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases where '' does not happen

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' followed by 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' with amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' by 'STAFF MEMBER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' over 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of times 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs in the most frequent process variant
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activities for cases where activity '' does not occur

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' in cases with 'Request Payment' activity
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' for cases where activity 'Request Payment' occurs

Name: Percentage decrease in 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' after introducing a pre-approval guideline adjustment
Metric: the average of the function base < 0 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' that are eventually approved
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' in the first quarter of the year compared to the rest of the year
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' per month
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activities
